players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We should vote her out."
Diana: "Bob, I've heard your accusations. You're trying to mislead us."
Diana: "Bob, I've been watching you. You're being suspiciously quiet after accusing me. What's really going on?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
